# rangedBeaconConstraints

**Instance Property**

The set of beacon constraints currently being tracked using ranging.

## Declaration

```swift
var rangedBeaconConstraints: Set<CLBeaconIdentityConstraint> { get }
```

## Performing beacon ranging

- **startRangingBeacons(satisfying:)**: Starts the delivery of notifications for the specified beacon constraints.
- **stopRangingBeacons(satisfying:)**: Stops the delivery of notifications for the specified beacon constraints.
